## Project Overview
Full-stack vendor advertising web application with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React with hooks, React Router, Context API
- Backend: Node.js + Express (RESTful API)
- Database: MongoDB + Mongoose
- Authentication: JWT
- Image Upload: Cloudinary
- Security: helmet, cors, bcrypt, express-validator
